text: Two Sisters from Boston is a 1946 American musical comedy movie directed by Henry Koster and starring Kathryn Grayson, June Allyson, Peter Lawford, Jimmy Durante, Lauritz Melchior, Nella Walker. It was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn- Mayer. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1946 comedy movies Category:1946 musical movies Category:American musical comedy movies Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by Henry Koster
title: Two Sisters from Boston
